ADMINISTRATOR.name: ADMINISTRATOR
ADMINISTRATOR.desc: Allows all permissions and bypasses channel permission overwrites

MANAGE_CHANNELS.name: MANAGE_CHANNELS
MANAGE_CHANNELS.desc: Allows management and editing of channels

MANAGE_GUILD.name: MANAGE_GUILD
MANAGE_GUILD.desc: Allows management and editing of the guild

ADD_REACTIONS.name: ADD_REACTIONS
ADD_REACTIONS.desc: Allows for the addition of reactions to messages

READ_MESSAGES.name: READ_MESSAGES
READ_MESSAGES.desc: Allows reading messages in a channel. The channel will not appear for users without this permission

SEND_MESSAGES.name: SEND_MESSAGES
SEND_MESSAGES.desc: Allows for sending messages in a channel.

MANAGE_MESSAGES.name: MANAGE_MESSAGES
MANAGE_MESSAGES.desc: Allows for deletion of other users messages

EMBED_LINKS.name: EMBED_LINKS
EMBED_LINKS.desc: Links sent by this user will be auto-embedded

ATTACH_FILES.name: ATTACH_FILES
ATTACH_FILES.desc: Allows for uploading images and files

READ_MESSAGE_HISTORY.name: READ_MESSAGE_HISTORY
READ_MESSAGE_HISTORY.desc: Allows for reading of message history

MENTION_EVERYONE.name: MENTION_EVERYONE
MENTION_EVERYONE.desc: Allows for using the @everyone tag to notify all users in a channel, and the @here tag to notify all online users in a channel

USE_EXTERNAL_EMOJIS.name: USE_EXTERNAL_EMOJIS
USE_EXTERNAL_EMOJIS.desc: Allows the usage of custom emojis from other servers

CONNECT.name: CONNECT
CONNECT.desc: Allows for joining of a voice channel

SPEAK.name: SPEAK
SPEAK.desc: Allows for speaking in a voice channel

MUTE_MEMBERS.name: MUTE_MEMBERS
MUTE_MEMBERS.desc: Allows for muting members in a voice channel

DEAFEN_MEMBERS.name: DEAFEN_MEMBERS
DEAFEN_MEMBERS.desc: Allows for deafening of members in a voice channel

MOVE_MEMBERS.name: MOVE_MEMBERS
MOVE_MEMBERS.desc: Allows for moving of members between voice channels

USE_VAD.name: USE_VAD
USE_VAD.desc: Allows for using voice-activity-detection in a voice channel

CHANGE_NICKNAME.name: CHANGE_NICKNAME
CHANGE_NICKNAME.desc: Allows for modification of own nickname

MANAGE_NICKNAMES.name: MANAGE_NICKNAMES
MANAGE_NICKNAMES.desc: Allows for modification of other users nicknames

MANAGE_ROLES.name: MANAGE_ROLES
MANAGE_ROLES.desc: Allows management and editing of roles

MANAGE_WEBHOOKS.name: MANAGE_WEBHOOKS
MANAGE_WEBHOOKS.desc: Allows management and editing of webhooks

MANAGE_EMOJIS.name: MANAGE_EMOJIS
MANAGE_EMOJIS.desc: Allows management and editing of emojis
